content.rendered:
The Seren Fach Centre offers a wide range of services for children and their families in an environment, which has been designed with children in mind.

  • Architect designed, purpose built building.
  • Maximum use of natural light.
  • Dedicated outdoor all weather play area.
  • Sensory room.
  • Multi-purpose communal play area.
  • Age specific rooms.
  • Imaginative room layouts.
  • CCTV
  • Door entry system.
  • Care for children aged 6 weeks to 12 years.
